SEARCH
Package executor.service.service.proxy

Class HttpProxySourcesClient

java.lang.Object
executor.service.service.proxy.HttpProxySourcesClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProxySourcesClient
@Service public class HttpProxySourcesClient extends Object implements ProxySourcesClient
Service class implementing the ProxySourcesClient interface for retrieving proxies from an HTTP source.

The HttpProxySourcesClient class serves as an implementation of the ProxySourcesClient interface, providing functionality to retrieve proxies from an HTTP source. It uses the provided URL (clientProxyUrl) and authentication token (workerApiToken) to make requests to the proxy source server for obtaining available proxies.

The class is annotated with @Service, indicating that it is a Spring service bean, and may be managed and injected by the Spring IoC container.

The class includes fields for configuration properties, such as the client proxy URL and worker API token, as well as dependencies on the RsaManager and RestTemplate for handling encryption and making HTTP requests, respectively.

It is recommended to use this service class as part of the overall scenario execution process, where proxies are obtained for executing scenarios with different configurations.

See Also:

  • RsaManager
  • RestTemplate

  • Constructor Details

    • HttpProxySourcesClient

      public HttpProxySourcesClient(org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate restTemplate, RsaManager rsaManager)
      Configuration properties and dependencies for the HttpProxySourcesClient service.

      The HttpProxySourcesClient class relies on the following properties and dependencies for its functionality:

      • clientProxyUrl: The URL used to access the proxy source server for obtaining proxies. It is specified by the configuration property client.url.proxy.
      • workerApiToken: The authentication token used when making requests to the proxy source server. It is specified by the configuration property executor.service.auth.token.value.
      • rsaManager: An instance of the RsaManager class, providing encryption and decryption capabilities for secure communication with the proxy source server.
      • restTemplate: An instance of the RestTemplate class, used for making HTTP requests to the proxy source server for obtaining available proxies.

      These properties and dependencies are crucial for the proper functioning of the service, enabling it to securely communicate with the proxy source server and retrieve proxies as needed.

      See Also:
      • RsaManager
      • RestTemplate

  • Method Details

    • getProxy

      public ProxyConfigHolder getProxy(String username)
      Retrieves a ProxyConfigHolder for the specified username from the proxy source server.

      The getProxy method is responsible for making a request to the proxy source server to obtain proxy configuration information for a specific username. It constructs the URL based on the client proxy URL and the provided username, then uses the method getProxyConfigHolder(String) to perform the actual retrieval of proxy configuration information.

      The method takes a single parameter:

      • username: The username for which proxy configuration information is to be retrieved.

      The method follows these steps:

      1. Constructs the URL for accessing the proxy source server using the client proxy URL and the provided username.
      2. Calls the getProxyConfigHolder(String) method, passing the constructed URL, to retrieve the proxy configuration.
      3. Returns the obtained ProxyConfigHolder containing the proxy configuration information for the specified username.
      4. In case of an exception during the process, logs an error message and returns null.

      It is recommended to use this method as part of the overall scenario execution process, where proxies are obtained for executing scenarios with different configurations based on the username.

      Specified by:
      getProxy in interface ProxySourcesClient
      Parameters:
      username - The username for which proxy configuration information is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A ProxyConfigHolder containing the proxy configuration information for the specified username, or null if an error occurs during the retrieval process.
      See Also:
      • ProxyConfigHolder
      • getProxyConfigHolder(String)
